name: reldmresv

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cresv, universe, universe, cif(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cresv))
-| wceq(cresv, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cif(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(|`v))
⊣ |`v =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ if((Base `(Scalar ` hs0))⊆ hs1, hs0,(hs0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),((Scalar ` hs0)[|`s]hs1)>)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
